payload.name: speed_of_sound
payload.description: The speed of sound in the measurement medium. ~1,500,000 mm/s for water.

payload.name: start_mm
payload.description: Start of ping range, set to 0.

payload.name: length_mm
payload.description: Length of the returned profile, end of range = start_mm + length_mm.

payload.name: msec_per_ping
payload.description: Set value to limit ping rate, normally set to 0 for best ping rate.

payload.name: reserved_1
payload.description: Set to 0

payload.name: reserved_2
payload.description: Set to 0

payload.name: pulse_len_percent
payload.description: % of total ping time for current range, 0.002 typical.

payload.name: filter_duration_percent
payload.description: 0.0015 typical.

payload.name: gain_index
payload.description: Set to -1 for auto gain, otherwise 0-7 sets gain.

payload.name: num_results
payload.description: Number of signal data points in resulting profile (200-1200), 600 typical.

payload.name: enable
payload.description: 1 or 0 to enable or disable pinging.

payload.name: reserved_3
payload.description: Set to 0

os_mono_profile.description: A profile produced from a single acoustic measurement. The data returned is an array of response strength, in dB, at even intervals across the scan region. The scan region is defined as the region between <scan_start> and <scan_start + scan_length> millimeters away from the transducer. Note that the amplitude of the results are in dB. This is just to keep high dynamic range in the u16 sized data elements. Normally these are converted back to linear power or signal levels.

payload.name: ping_number
payload.description: sequentially assigned from 0 at power up

payload.name: start_mm
payload.description: The beginning of the scan region in mm from the transducer.

payload.name: length_mm
payload.description: The length of the scan region.

payload.name: timestamp_ms
payload.description: msec since power up at time of ping

payload.name: ping_hz
payload.description: Frequency of acoustic signal

payload.name: num_results
payload.description: length of pwr_results array

payload.name: sos_dmps
payload.description: speed of sound, decimeters/sec

payload.name: pwr_results
payload.description: An array of return strength measurements taken at regular intervals across the scan region. The first element is the closest measurement to the sensor, and the last element is the farthest measurement in the scanned range. power results scaled from min_pwr_db to max_pwr_db
